title: [caffe2][nomnigraph] Generic subgraph replacement
body_html:
The PR creates a subgraph identification and replacement algorithm which takes in two functions,

  • support: to indicate whether we support transform on certain nodes or not, which helps to identify the transform subgraph
  • transform: which takes a subgraph and output a transformed subgraph while maintaining the input/output interface, except that it can absorb weight if necessary.

Potential usage of it is to cut-off runnable subgraph and off-load it to special libraries for acceleration.

The PR creates a subgraph identification and replacement algorithm which takes in two functions,

support: to indicate whether we support transform on certain nodes or not, which helps to identify the transform subgraph
transform: which takes a subgraph and output a transformed subgraph while maintaining the input/output interface, except that it can absorb weight if necessary.

Potential usage of it is to cut-off runnable subgraph and off-load it to special libraries for acceleration.
body:
The PR creates a subgraph identification and replacement algorithm which takes in two functions,
- `support`: to indicate whether we support transform on certain nodes or not, which helps to identify the transform subgraph
- `transform`: which takes a subgraph and output a transformed subgraph while maintaining the input/output interface, except that it can absorb weight if necessary. 

Potential usage of it is to cut-off runnable subgraph and off-load it to special libraries for acceleration.
